title: The Grayscale Court Victory
description: A 60-second lesson on The Grayscale Court Victory.

hook.text: In 2023, Grayscale sued the SEC and won, forcing the agency to reconsider its rejection of a Bitcoin ETF.

buildup.text: Grayscale argued the SEC approved Bitcoin futures ETFs but rejected spot ETFs. The logic was inconsistent.

discovery.text: The court agreed unanimously. The SEC's distinction between futures and spot was 'arbitrary and capricious.'

twist.text: The ruling didn't force the SEC to approve. But politically, the agency had no defensible reason to keep refusing.

climax.text: A court forced the SEC's hand. The Bitcoin ETF approval that followed changed institutional crypto adoption forever.

punchline.text: A court called the SEC's logic arbitrary. Weeks later, Bitcoin ETFs were approved.

quiz.question: What did the court find about the SEC's ETF rejection?
options: Rejecting spot ETFs while allowing futures ETFs was arbitrary and capricious
